title: LF Top Lane Main
body:
-Must be semi-serious
-Free quite a bit
-TeamSpeak 3, Raid Call or Skype
-Open to constructive criticism
-Good champion pool with tanky bruisers/initiators
-Also a 'big' champion pool is not necessary, as long as the champs in that pool are good.

Team currently consists of Bronze Jungle and Mid, Silver AD and Diamond Support
